group_1.narration: On New Year's Day, at a shrine in Daito...
A lone figure stood.@An elegant, graceful girl, clad in a kimono.
And of course, that girl was...

group_1.textRight: Kanagi!

group_1.textLeft: A Happy New Year to you, too. I hope it's@a good one.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm looking forward to it!

group_1.narration: I am Mitama Yakumo.@A young, trendy girl, beautifully@dressed in a sophisticated kimono♪

group_1.textRight: Sorry for making you have to wait for me@on New Year's morning!
It took so much longer to get dressed than@I expected.

group_1.textLeft: I only just arrived here myself. Don't@worry about it.

group_1.textRight: Ah...thanks.
(She hasn't noticed?)
(Yes! That's it, Kanagi!)
(Hurry and tell me! Tell me what you think@about my kimono!)

group_1.textLeft: New Year's morning sure is busy.
In fact, the crowds were the reason I was@delayed.

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Honestly!
Don't you have anything else to say to me?
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Is something wrong? You're suddenly quiet.

group_1.textRight: No, nothing at all.
(I just realized, this is my first time at a@shrine on New Year's with a friend.)
(I'm honestly quite excited! How unlike@me...)

group_1.narration: — Mitama —@(I wish to prosper as a Coordinator.)
— Mitama —@(And to be able to wow everyone@with my delicious cooking.)
— Mitama —@(Oh, and I hope lots of wonderful things@happen to me this year...ASAP.)

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Phew.
(I made lots of wishes again this year.)

group_1.textLeft: You took your time. What in the world were@you wishing for?

group_1.textRight: Hmm? Let me see...
I wished that riches would come rolling in@to the business...all sorts of things♪

group_1.textLeft: They say the more you wish for, the more@difficult it is to get it...

group_1.textRight: No, no! It's quite the opposite!
Wish for more, and it's more likely your @wishes will come true!

group_1.textLeft: Hm? What's the logic behind that?

group_1.textRight: We have no way of knowing what wishes the@gods will choose to grant...
So if we make lots, then the odds of one of@them coming true will be higher!

group_1.textLeft: So you hope for a lucky shot in the dark.

group_1.textRight: (All right, next is...)
Oh! Fortunes! [chara:111700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:111700:cheek_0][chara:111700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:111700:lipSynch_1]Shall we go get one?
